entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102548-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #19861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #sdk-102550-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #19859
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet workload install creates .nuget with root permissions in clean env #19823
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • After install 6.0 Preview 7 on Mac OS, install workload maui using command line failed. #19822
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx

Closed

  • Workload: Add offline cache option to repair command #19775
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Pathmap does not seem to be working, resulting in determinism failure #15321
    untriaged
  • A referenced assembly was compiled using a newer version of Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.dll. #19363
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Publishing standalone app (C#) fails with C++/CLI dependency #12345
    6.0.1xx
  • Something changed in VS 2022 Preview 3 and VS 2019 16.11 that breaks VB WinForms Apps #19735
    Area-External, Area-NetSDK, Discussion
  • WPF/Winforms fails to run. #19871
    untriaged
  • Cannot get symbol ucol_setMaxVariable_50 from libicui18n #16009
    untriaged
  • Maui: Workload installation failed: The transaction has aborted #19739
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Update implicit global usings feature to address issues #19521
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, 6.0.1xx
  • Add workload force clean option #19603
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • manifest authoring or manifest reading is broken for the latest stage 0 #19866
    release blocking, Area-Workloads
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102567-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #19862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract includes XML and other files into output binary #19322
    Bug, Area-SingleFile, 6.0.1xx
  • Could add parameters(--local/remote) for workload command? #19755
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, Discussion
  • Workloads: Ensure commands are atomic #19773
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.2xx
  • Workloads: Support custom install locations #19774
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Workloads: Detect and wait for active installs #19770
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.2xx
  • Include testing for packages containing native DLLs > 2GB #18507
    Area-NetSDK, Backlog
  • ASP: Security policy would not allow process: /Users/<username>/.dotnet/tools/dotnet-ef #19560
    Area-Tools, 6.0.1xx
  • How do we check if workloads / workload packs are installed on first run experience? Do we have to go through the IAL, or just check files on disk? #19060
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.2xx
  • dotnet globally installed tools being killed immediately #19240
    Area-Tools
  • .NET 6 Preview 7 Blazor WebAssembly won't build if you are using a JsonSerializerContext implementation #19834
    release blocking, Area-NetSDK, 6.0.1xx
  • Switch CLI language with a dotnet option #19246
    Discussion
  • Dotnet CLI does not work properly in VS 22 Terminal? #19251
    Area-External, 6.0.1xx
  • BindingRedirect warning behaves inconsistently #19391
    Area-NetSDK, Discussion
  • Microsoft.NETFramework.ReferenceAssemblies not added when using NuGet static restore graph #19506
    Area-External, untriaged, 6.0.1xx
  • `dotnet sdk check` command is not source-build compatible #19761
    Area-CLI, 6.0.1xx
  • Preview 7 UX for Arm64/x64 co-existence on macOS #19743
    Area-External, Team:Runtime, Discussion
  • build .NET Framework WPF project in linux docker container #19747
    Area-NetSDK, Discussion
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-sdk-.NET 6, sdk #sdk-102308-.NET6 #19799
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgraded to .net 6 Preview 7 and workload commands are failing #19670
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Solution build running for 18 min. after upgrade to Visual Studio 2022 17.0.0 Preview 3.0 and SDK 6.0.100-preview.7.21379.14 #19695
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Preview7 publish does not include compiled typescript output in static web assets #19692
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • SDK build sporadically failing due to multiple pipelines trying to concurrently upload 'BlobArtifacts/dotnet-toolset-internal-6.0.100-ci.zip' #19679
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bring back the option to use old templates (non-top level statements style) (changed in .NET Preview 7) #19672
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Workload commands failing after installing VS2022 Preview 3 and .NET 6 Preview 7 #19671
    Area-External, untriaged
  • "dotnet workload update --print-download-link-only" command fails #19691
    Area-Workloads
  • dotnet pack version suffix is not respected #19713
    Area-External, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Tweak the settings when invoking referenced projects #19704
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • .NET SDK 6 Preview 7 generated file `ImplicitNamespaceImports.cs` contains error CS8773 #19702
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .Net 6 Preview 7 sdk is adversely affecting npm commands #19700
    untriaged, Area-Install
  • referenced package in .NET is not copied if the OutputType is not “Exe” #19698
    Area-External, untriaged
  • The "GenerateBundle" task failed unexpectedly Windows Server 20H2 #19792
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Some tests fail on Linux (CI doesn't run all tests) #19783
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • .NET6 preview 7 cannot find System.Net.Quic automatically. #19748
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Current 6.0 SDK building in VS errors with 'Microsoft.NET.SDK.WorkloadAutoImportPropsLocator' specified could not be found. #17461
    Area-NetSDK, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • CPU usage much higher in 5.0.302 compared to 5.0.202 #19587
    performance, Area-Infrastructure, Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Check that SDK and app archs match before setting `DOTNET_ROOT` when using `dotnet run` #19860
    Area-External, Team:Runtime
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/command-line-api #19853
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Change dotnet-new output encoding to utf8 #19847
    Area-External, 7.0.1xx
  • Update stage 0 #19842
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix workload update #19835
    Area-Workloads
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19824
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19821
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from devdiv/DevDiv/NuGet-NuGet.Client-Trusted #19809
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from nuget/nuget.client #19808
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from nuget/nuget.client #19807
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from nuget/nuget.client #19806
    Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • Cherry-pick changes to 6.0 branch #19848
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19849
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #19836
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19851
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/fsharp #19843
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19845
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Ensure /p:PublishUsingPipelines is passed (#19832) #19839
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Ensure /p:PublishUsingPipelines is passed (#19832) #19838
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19841
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19837
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn-analyzers #19833
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19812
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Ensure /p:PublishUsingPipelines is passed #19832
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/format #19828
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19819
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #19831
  • Allow Razor code generation when using the Razor source generator #19803
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Preserve environment variable previously configured on ProcessStartInfo #19804
    Area-External
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/msbuild #19827
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #19818
  • Update Versions.props for RC2 #19801
    Branding
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/fsharp #19826
    Area-FSharp
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0.4xx' => 'main' #19787
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19820
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #19817
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/msbuild #19782
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn-analyzers #19813
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19815
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/msbuild #19810
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/msbuild #19811
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/command-line-api #19814
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19805
    Area-External
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19797
    Area-External
  • Disable processing in RazorSourceGenerator when no razor files are involved #19791
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Set the EnableDynamicLoading property before importing Microsoft.PackageDependencyResolution.targets #19764
    Area-External

Updated

  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19870
  • Could not copy the file deps.json because it was not found. Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets #17943
  • Cache results of ResolveTargetingPackAssets across builds #19570
    Area-NetSDK
  • Implicit RID support #19725
    Area-External
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19781
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix workload update #19703
    Area-Workloads
  • Update Versions.props for 7.0 branding #19800
    Branding
  • [Package Validation] resolve references when running API Compat #19771
    Area-Compatibility
  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads
